outputs.output_descr:
The project aims at filling an important niche which will contribute to address the most needed capacity gap located at the transition phase between emergency and development, a key factor to enable good governance and lasting peace which will ultimately fund the basis for sustainable development.

This project has 3 components:
1.rehabilitation and equipment of selected infrastructures of the Rwanda Peace Academy including the construction of a new lecture hall building.

2. capacity building: a) of the RPA staff mainly in organisational and administrative expertise including IT but also in training capacity; b) of regional and international actors of post conflict recovery courses, workshops, conferences and others

3. development and implementation of a public relations element which will enable the centre to establish itself as a regionally and internationally recognised centre of excellence.

project_descr: Support to the Establishment of the Rwanda Peace Academy
project_title: Support to the Establishment of the Rwanda Peace Academy
